dublin_core.dcvalue: In this study we have developed nursing care support using Personal Digital Assistants PDA with web service architecture With the survey of the log nursing care support system we have found out the nurse use the emergency to bypass the authentication and to access the operation quickly We have concluded the compression of response time is the key of correct these abuse We have developed rich client with web service to cut down the response time We can achieve to shorten it into 80 of total operation time
AMIA ... Annual Symposium proceedings / AMIA Symposium. AMIA Symposium
Development of nursing care system with web service.
